alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 11:39AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN ST. BERNARD, EAST CENTRAL LAFOURCHE, CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHWESTERN PLAQUEMINES PARISHES THROUGH 1215 PM CST... At 1139 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Lafitte to Golden Meadow. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galliano, Cut Off, Port Sulphur, Golden Meadow, Myrtle Grove, Pointe A La Hache, Lafitte, and Barataria. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard
